interactions: m_c wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could get {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt to shine like r_r's.
m_c thinks the prey r_r is biting into on the other side of camp looks delicious.
m_c is jealous that r_r got to go to the last Gathering.
m_c is jealous that r_r went on patrol without {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.
m_c is jealous that r_r got praised by the leader.
m_c is jealous that r_r got to fight in a border skirmish when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didn't.
m_c is jealous that r_r got to go on border patrol this morning.
m_c doesn't understand how r_r got so good at hunting.
m_c is jealous that r_r is getting more attention than {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.
m_c is upset that r_r always wins in their games.
m_c hisses at r_r for getting a bigger piece of prey.
m_c looks at r_r and remembers how easy it was to be a kitten.
m_c is resentful that so much is expected of {PRONOUN/m_c/object}, yet no one expects anything of r_r.
m_c is jealous that r_r gets to do cool super secret healer things.
m_c thinks it's unfair that r_r always gets to go to Gatherings.
m_c is complaining that r_r never does anything helpful.
m_c sees r_r lazing about in the sunshine and is resentful at how little {PRONOUN/r_r/subject}{VERB/r_r/'re/'s} expected to contribute.
